name: area: build
description: the sampctl build and ensure process, dependencies, etc.

name: area: code
description: relates to the code, suggestions for libraries or bugs caused by logical errors

name: area: gameplay
description: relates to a gameplay mechanic specifically, user-facing, design, etc.

name: area: meta
description: issues regarding issues themselves and GitHub in general

name: area: repo
description: repository layout, dot files, documentation, github files, etc.

name: misc: good first issue
description: good for a new contributor

name: misc: help wanted
description: help wanted from another contributor

name: pr: needs discussion
description: requires discussion before further action

name: pr: needs docs
description: requires documentation either via Readme file or code comments

name: pr: needs review
description: requires another contributor to review

name: pr: needs tests
description: requires in-game testing or unit testing to verify completeness

name: pr: work in progress
description: pull request should not be merged

name: severity: A
description: a run time error that crashes the server or causes memory corruption

name: severity: B
description: significantly impairs its basic functionality or prevents feature access/use

name: severity: C
description: purely visual or gameplay related annoyance, does not impair functionality

name: status: cannot reproduce
description: the bug cannot be repeated by developers, possibly user error

name: status: confirmed
description: the bug has been confirmed

name: status: deferred
description: put off until a later time or depends on something else being solved first

name: status: discuss
description: requires discussion before further action

name: status: duplicate
description: duplicate of another issue

name: status: in-progress
description: actively being worked on by a member of the team or a contributor

name: status: invalid
description: doesn't warrant an issue at all

name: type: bug
description: unexpected behaviour caused by mistake in code

name: type: discussion
description: a discussion regarding the project in general that warrants its own issue

name: type: optimisation
description: an improvement that relates to performance of the code at runtime

name: type: proposal
description: a formal proposal for a new feature or change to a feature that includes implementation details

name: type: question
description: a question regarding the area the issue is about

name: type: regression
description: bug caused by upstream changes

name: type: suggestion
description: a high-level suggestion for an idea, little to no implementation details or roadmap

name: type: todo
description: general task for a basic feature or minor fix set by a project lead that needs to be completed
